price: Obi a ͻbεbͻ mmͻden no, ͻbͻ mmͻden no dema neho. Nokorε sε Nyankopͻn deε Wanya Neho wͻ abͻdeε nyinaa so, (Ɔnhia obiara mmoa anaa obi hwee).
arabic: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman jāhada fa-innamā yujāhidu linafsihi inna al-laha laghaniyyun ʿani al-ʿālamīna
